## Generated image

```{r self-contained-image, fig.cap="a ggplot2-generated graph"}
library(tibble)
library(ggplot2)

data_frame(
  x = rnorm(1000),
  y = rnorm(1000)
) %>%
 ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
 geom_point()
```
